channel.title: Getting drunk
channel.description:
So I'm not making one of these thread to be like "omg im so cool i got wasted" ..
Basically I was drinking a bit last night and after 15 shots of Pinnacle Vodka, I was drunk. I don't usually drink much, but what's the average amount of shots needed before getting drunk? I think I did pretty well for an Asian, haha, and I got the Asian glow. (Face gets extremely red.)
My friends also tell me I do very sexual things when I'm drunk. :3
What are your opinions on drinking?

item.title: Getting drunk
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Killed half a bottle jack once. I wasn’t wasted, I was just a little buzzed. Gotta love that German blood.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting drunk
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“youridudock, post:54, topic:433489”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=536211.msg3921665#msg3921665 date=1329775290]
Only time I got ‘buzzed’ (my family is known for rock stomachs) was after a game of Capt. Dickhead. We each had our own packs of beer (around here you can get a 50pack <3 that’s what we used). I had 5 left when I came home. I was walking slightly funny, but could speak and operate otherwise just fine. Of course I still had a decent headache. Won’t do it again though, it ruined drinking for me.

PROTIP: Never mix beer and hard liquor lol. Uncle did that and got fucked up quck.
[/quote]

What do you mean with your PROTIP? Dont drink beer and liquor at the same day or dont put them together and drink it?[/quote]
Same sitting. When they mix, idk if one helps the other sink in, but you get drunk very quickly, and sometimes get very sick.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting drunk
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

When I was in college I used to get wicked hammered. My nickname was Puke. I would chug a fifth of So Co, sneak into a frat party, polish off a few people’s empties, some brewskies, some Jell-o shots, do some body shots off myself… Pass out, wake up the next morning, boot, rally, more So Co, head to class. Probably would’ve got expelled if I had’ve let it affect my grades but I aced all my courses. They called me Ace. It was totally awesome. Got straight B’s. They called me Buzz.

[size=1pt]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DzLAvHNOmck&feature=related[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Getting drunk
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:37, topic:433489”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=536211.msg3921164#msg3921164 date=1329713973]
I don’t like alcohol because it causes people to do things they normally wouldn’t, a few drinks is fine but having so much that you’re unable to walk straight is ridiculous.

What kind of drunk do you think i’d be? O.o
[/quote]the drag queen drunk

but yea, I think getting drunk is kinda pointless[/quote]
The drag queen drunk? What do you mean by that?

Read full topic

item.title: Getting drunk
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

everclear is for real men. the 190 proof kind(its basically moonshine). at first i didnt like beer but after drinking a full bottle on several occasions it starts tasting better. I’d like to get so drunk i dont remember what i do but i never do the most ive ever got drunk was a mix of 2 shots of tequila, 1 of vodka, and 1 of everclear. i still remembered what i did and had full control but had very delayed actions. that time i drank that i laughed for 5 minutes straight at nothing. I feel like when i have a slight buzz that my brain works more smoothly also i dont feel as awkward talking to ppl as i do when sober. btw im 6’, 140 lbs. I like vodka, whiskey, bourbon, and tequila(it takes effect very quick) but thats basically all ive been able to try…

Read full topic
